snippet.title: 惑星战士G / G WARRIOR PV
snippet.description:
惑星战士G / G.WARRIOR 宣传PV
On sale within 2024! ! ! / 2024年内发售！！！
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2710290

Planet Warrior G is a retro hardcore action shooting game. Pick up the gun in your hand and destroy all the robots and aliens. Fight in colorful scenes such as snowy mountains, caves, seas of fire, alien lairs, etc.! !

feature:
– Takes you back to the nostalgic retro pixel style of the 1990s. Do you still remember the scenes of friends, home consoles and arcades in those years?
– Pick up weapons and rush, rush, jump, exciting adventures are waiting for you!
– A variety of weapons and skills, such as lasers, shields, shotguns, charged energy cannons, flames, etc., to defeat various bosses and avoid their attacks perfectly
– The music is also in retro 8bit style! !

惑星战士G 是一款复古的硬派动作射击游戏，拿起手上的枪，把机器人和异形全部都射爆。在雪山，洞穴，火海，异形巢穴等等丰富多彩的场景里战斗！！

特征：
– 带你回到1990 年代的怀旧复古像素风格，还记得那些年的小伙伴，家用机和街机景象吗
– 拿起武器突突突，冲冲冲，跳跳跳，刺激的冒险之旅等着你！
– 多样的武器和技能，如激光，护盾，散弹，蓄力能量炮，火焰等等，击破各种BOSS，完美回避他们的攻击
– 音乐也是复古8bit风格的哦！！
